title: The atomic Leibniz rule
authors: Ben Elias, Hankyung Ko, Nicolas Libedinsky, Leonardo Patimo
abstract:
The Demazure operator associated to a simple reflection satisfies the twisted
Leibniz rule. In this paper we introduce a generalization of the twisted
Leibniz rule for the Demazure operator associated to any atomic double coset.
We prove that this atomic Leibniz rule is equivalent to a polynomial forcing
property for singular Soergel bimodules.
